alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Webster and central Hamilton Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Webster City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jewell Junction around 650 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to reduction in visibility.
